content.subject_line: Introducing Our New Dinner For Two For Only $47.9
content.headline: Introducing our new Dine & Discover Sharing for Two!
content.body_copy: Choose 2 salads, 2 entrées and 2 premium sides for one attractive price! For just $5 upgrade your entrée to our premium options like our Bistro Filet. Your new favorite is waiting to be discovered!

content.subject_line: Introducing Our New Dinner For Two For Only $47.9
content.headline: Enjoy this seasonal martini for only $7 during social hour
content.body_copy: Expertly crafted with Fris vodka infused for 3 days with fresh apples and cinnamon sticks. We shake it with Domaine De Canton ginger liquor, house-made honey syrup, fresh sour mix, apple juice and garnished with a red apple slice and cinnamon sprinkle.!

content.subject_line: Our New Winter Specials Are Now Available...And So Good!
content.headline: NEW! SMOKY tomato butter GROUPER
content.body_copy: Bonefish Grill is proud to present NEW! wood-grilled Grouper topped with a smoky tomato butter made of fire-roasted and sun-dried tomatoes with smoky chili seasoning. Served with NEW! Creamy Parmesan Risotto and fresh seasonal vegetables.

content.subject_line: Our New Winter Specials Are Now Available...And So Good!
content.headline: WINTER SPECIALS SO NICE... THEY'RE naughty
content.body_copy: Our NEW! winter specials are here! Try entrées like Linguine Del Mar starting at $19.9, Cedar Plank "Old-Fashioned" Salmon and Smoky Tomato Butter on your choice of Grouper, Pork Chop or Filet. And be sure to finish with our delicious Chocolate Lava Cake.

content.subject_line: Our New Winter Specials Are Now Available...And So Good!
content.headline: ENJOY $7 WINTER WHITE COSMOS DURING SOCIAL HOUR for a limited time
content.body_copy: Starting today, our most popular seasonal martini is back on the menu and to celebrate this, enjoy it for only $7 during Social Hour through December 3rd.

content.subject_line: Fall For Our New Seasonal Dishes!
content.headline: 3-COURSE MEAL 2 PEOPLE 1 GREAT DEAL
content.body_copy: Our popular 3-course meal for two is back on the menu! Don't miss this special offer and choose two featured entrées like our wood-fired grilled Atlantic Salmon, two salads and our Key Lime Cake to share - all for only $45.9

content.subject_line: Fall For Our New Seasonal Dishes!
content.headline: KEY LIME CAKE TO SHARE
content.body_copy: Our sweet and tart Key Lime Cake is included with your dinner for two and is the perfect dessert to share with someone special!

content.subject_line: Fall For Our New Seasonal Dishes!
content.headline: Add a fresh APPLE MARTINI
content.body_copy: Raise a glass with your special someone and add on a Fresh Apple Martini to your dinner for two and enjoy the flavors of the season with this limited time cocktail.

content.subject_line: $47.9 Gets You Dinner For Two
content.headline: 2 SALADS + 2 ENTREES + 2 PREMIUM SIDES FOR ONLY $47.9 FOR A LIMITED TIME
content.body_copy: Choose from popular entrées like Lily's Chicken, Mango Salsa Atlantic Salmon, Chimichurri Pork Tenderloin and more! This is a dinner for two you can't miss.

content.subject_line: $47.9 Gets You Dinner For Two
content.headline: CHOOSE YOUR PREMIUM SIDES
content.body_copy: Your Dine & Discover Sharing For Two dinner includes your choice of two premium sides. Enjoy sides that compliment your entrée selections like Creamy Parmesan Risotto, Kung Pao Brussels Sprouts, Bacon Mac & Cheese and more!

content.subject_line: $47.9 Gets You Dinner For Two
content.headline: WHY SHOULD MONDAYS HAVE ALL OF THE FUN? ENJOY $7 MARTINIS ALL DAY ON SATURDAY 11/18
content.body_copy: Enjoy a Martini Monday this Saturday, November 18th. Enjoy your favorite Bonefish martini for just $7, one day only. See you Saturday!

content.subject_line: All Starters Are Half Price On Oct. 21st!
content.headline: SATURDAY, OCT. 21 ALL STARTERS ARE HALF PRICE
content.body_copy: October is National Seafood Month, and one way we're celebrating is offering our appetizers for half price on Saturday, October 21st, all day long! Enjoy your choice of a delicious appetizer, like the one and only Bang Bang Shrimp®, or seasoned Crab-Topped Bang Bang Fries, or everyone's favorite, the Tempura Crunch Sashimi Tuna. There are so many options and whatever you choose, it's sure to please. See you Saturday!

content.subject_line: Come Try Our NEW! Spring Specials
content.headline: DIVE INTO DELICIOUS WITH OUR NEW! SPRING SPECIALS AVAILABLE NOW.
content.body_copy: Enjoy new entrées like the Caribbean Cedar Plank Salmon, Rockefeller Butterfish, and Scallop & Shrimp Scampi Pasta or topped Filet Mignon.

content.subject_line: Come Try Our NEW! Spring Specials
content.headline: ENJOY $5 OFF ONLINE ORDERS OF $30
content.body_copy: Focus on the Game this March! Enjoy $5 off your online order of $30 or more now through 4/8. Take advantage of our curbside pick-up and enjoy your favorite like the Bang Bang Shrimp or our NEW seasonal favorites while cheering on your teams from home.

content.subject_line: Our Angler's Catch Is Back And Better Than Ever! Only $17.9
content.headline:
CALLING ALL SEAFOOD LOVERS! ONLY $17.9 
DON'T MISS OUR ANGLER'S CATCH AVAILABLE FOR A LIMITED TIME
content.body_copy: Celebrate National Seafood Month with this perfect combination! A generous portion of lightly tempura battered cod, paired with signature seasoned crispy shrimp, and delicious french fries, served with coleslaw and sauces for dipping, all for just $17.9 - Available for a limited time.

content.subject_line: Our Angler's Catch Is Back And Better Than Ever! Only $17.9
content.headline: ENJOY THIS $10 GIFT
content.body_copy: Thank you for being a Dine Rewards Member! Please enjoy the $10 Reward we have put in your member wallet, valid thru October 15th.

content.subject_line: Our Angler's Catch Is Back And Better Than Ever! Only $17.9
content.headline: $7 ALL MONTH DURING SOCIAL HOUR. ANOTHER REASON TO FALL IN LOVE WITH SOCIAL HOUR!
content.body_copy: Enjoy our seasonal favorite, Pumpkin Espresso On Ice for just $7 during Social Hour, all month long! Only at Bonefish Grill.

content.subject_line: Don't Miss Our Meal For Two For Only $45.9
content.headline: DINE & DISCOVER 3-COURSE MEAL 2 PEOPLE 1 GREAT DEAL
content.body_copy: Our popular 3-course meal for two is back on the menu! Don't miss this special offer and choose two featured entrées like our wood-fired grilled Atlantic Salmon, two salads and our Key Lime Cake to share - all for only $45.9

content.subject_line: Don't Miss Our Meal For Two For Only $45.9
content.headline: BANG BANG SHRIMP®  ENHANCE YOUR MEAL FOR TWO
content.body_copy: Enjoy the one and only Bang Bang Shrimp® tonight! Go ahead, add it to your Dine + Discover experience for the ultimate meal!

content.subject_line: Enjoy Half Off Appetizers This Saturday!
content.headline: SATURDAY, NOV. 4 ALL STARTERS ARE HALF PRICE!
content.body_copy: This Saturday we're bringing back our half price starters! Enjoy your choice of a delicious appetizer, like the one and only Bang Bang Shrimp®, or seasoned Crab-Topped Bang Fries, or everyone's favorite, the Tempura Crunch Sashimi Tuna. There are so many options and whatever you choose, it's sure to please. See you Saturday!

content.subject_line: Our Meal For Two For Only $45.9 Is Ending Soon!
content.headline: DINE & DISCOVER 3-COURSE MEAL 2 PEOPLE 1 GREAT DEAL $45.9
content.body_copy:
HURRY IN FOR THE LAST DAYS OF DINE & DISCOVER. ENDS SUNDAY OCT. 29TH 
3-course meal for two. You and a guest can each choose a salad, choose an entrée, and share a delicious slice of Key Lime Cake for just $45.9, but don't wait, offer ends on 10/29

content.subject_line: Our Meal For Two For Only $45.9 Is Ending Soon!
content.headline: $7 ALL MONTH DURING SOCIAL HOUR ANOTHER REASON TO FALL IN LOVE WITH SOCIAL HOUR!
content.body_copy: It's pumpkin season and what better way to enjoy the flavors than with a $7 hand-crafted Pumpkin Espresso Martini during Social Hour! Only at Bonefish Grill.
